      • loadRolesForUser

        java.util.List<Role> loadRolesForUser(java.lang.String userId,
                                    boolean includeImplicitRoles)
                                      throws DotDataException
        Retrieves all roles assigned to the user, if includeImplicitRoles is passed false then it will only return the roles directly assigned to the user and not the implicitly inherited from the role hierarchy
        Parameters:
        userId -
        includeImplicitRoles -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DotDataException

      • findRolesByNameFilter

        java.util.List<Role> findRolesByNameFilter(java.lang.String filter,
                                         int start,
                                         int limit)
                                           throws DotDataException
        This method returns a list of roles whose names are like the string passed in.
        Parameters:
        filter - compare string
        start - First element to display. For a negative value, zero is assumed.
        limit - Max number of elements to show. For a negative value, zero is assumed.
        Returns:
        List of Role entities.
        Throws:
        DotRuntimeException, - SystemException
        DotDataException
        Since:
        1.9

      • findRoleByName

        Role findRoleByName(java.lang.String rolename,
                  Role parent)
                    throws DotDataException
        This method returns the requested role based on the role id passed
        Parameters:
        rolename -
        parent - Can be null if it is a root role
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DotDataException

      • findRolesByFilterLeftWildcard

        java.util.List<Role> findRolesByFilterLeftWildcard(java.lang.String filter,
                                                 int start,
                                                 int limit)
                                                   throws DotDataException
        This method returns a list of roles whose names are like the string passed in. Left wildcarded, so "John S" would match "John Smith" but not "Mr. John Smith"
        Parameters:
        filter - compare string
        start - First element to display. For a negative value, zero is assumed.
        limit - Max number of elements to show. For a negative value, zero is assumed.
        Returns:
        List of Role entities.
        Throws:
        DotRuntimeException, - SystemException
        DotDataException
        Since:
        1.9

      • findRootRoles

        java.util.List<Role> findRootRoles()
                                   throws DotDataException
        Find all top level roles excluding the role key RoleAPI.USERS_ROOT_ROLE_KEY (cms_users). The cms_users is the place holder for user roles and is not typically needed for the pull of root roles this method will hit the database
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DotDataException

      • delete

        void delete(Role role)
            throws DotDataException,
                   DotStateException
        Removes a given Role.
        In order to remove a Role it is required first to remove the association of this Role with any user under it, remove its permissions and finally remove its layouts.
        Parameters:
        role -
        Throws:
        DotDataException
        DotStateException
